summary: Dawnbreaker enhanced meets Moro head hunter sword. Animated, powerful enchantments, kick ass vs undead.
descriptionHtml:
Featured video by Slothability

[youtube]KOXTwTDo63o[/youtube]

This guy does such super videos and keeps saving my bacon! Please support and check out his channel here.

http://www.youtube.com/user/Slothability?feature=watch


What is this mod?

Dawnbreaker enhanced meets Moro (Filipino) head hunter sword (Kampilan).

Features:

Early access to unrivalled bane of the undead, Paru-paru Bakunawa.

3 deadly modes of use for both attack and defence allowing unique game play.

Scratch built Models and 2K Textures.

Animated and functional Kurgan (Highlander) style Sword Breakers. They will disarm foe.

Brand new to the game draw/sheath sound effects appropriate to the mod.

Effects laden model. (effects turn off when weapon sheathed)

============================================================================================

Powers:


Animated and functional Sword breakers. (bash)

Chance to disarm when power bashing and animated to open/close.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Base Enchantments and Stats as Dawnbreaker.

Burns for 10 points, and when killing undead, a chance to cause a fiery explosion that turns or destroys nearby undead

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Additional Enchantments of Dawnguard rune shield. (block)

+10 Bash damage against vampires, and sustained blocking creates a minor sun shield doing 10 points of damage to undead while draining the wielder\'s stamina. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Where do I get it?

In Bleakfalls Barrow, just behind the chest next to the Draugr boss\' tomb at the end. You know where I mean but there\'s shots in the images. While designed for new characters it will hold it\'s own at any level vs undead.

If you just want to try it out you can console it in with...

Help Paru  4

Player.additem XX 000D62 1

in the console. 

============================================================================================
INSTALLATION

Requires Dawnguard and latest version of Skyrim!!!

Click the Download with Manager button in the files section to download to NMM.
Activate the mod in NMM. 

To manually install, just download the file and extract the files into the data folder. Don\'t forget to activate the .esp :) 

===========================================================================================
CREDITS

The animations in this mod are based on the work done by Nez/Raden5 in the seminal mod Dwarven Mechanical Equipment.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14060//?

If you want to know how to animate objects/weapons this is where you go. Unbelievable modding at work here. 

Modder sa547 
For thinking I might have the juice to take on one of the fabled Weapons of Moroland :)

All sound effects were found under Creative Commons 1.0 

http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

and have no copyright.


Ruiuji/Gruntlock was kind enough to make a video. Cheers mate :)


[youtube]w8a5fWqf4iw[/youtube]

Check out his channel here.

https://www.youtube.com/user/Gruntlock?feature=watch
author: KettleWitch
